description:
Synched up on the latest master code last night and ran Tempest, now I have 6 new failing tests and this is what I found in the logs:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/41066/

I blame this commit which was just merged:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/7f0051d4736ae1b464efb6c1edcadbab688bb496

Failing tests:

>>> tempest.api.compute.security_groups.test_security_groups.SecurityGroupsTestJSON.test_server_security_groups[gate]	22 sec	1
>>> tempest.api.compute.security_groups.test_security_groups.SecurityGroupsTestXML.test_server_security_groups[gate]	23 sec	1
>>> tempest.api.compute.servers.test_instance_actions.InstanceActionsTestJSON.test_list_instance_actions[gate]	10 sec	1
>>> tempest.api.compute.servers.test_instance_actions.InstanceActionsTestXML.test_list_instance_actions[gate]	10 sec	1
>>> tempest.api.compute.servers.test_server_actions.ServerActionsTestJSON.test_reboot_server_hard[gate,smoke]	10 sec	1
>>> tempest.api.compute.servers.test_server_actions.ServerActionsTestXML.test_reboot_server_hard[gate,smoke]	11 sec	1
title: AttributeError when testing reboot

comments.content:
Synched up on the latest master code last night and ran Tempest, now I have 6 new failing tests and this is what I found in the logs:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/41066/

I blame this commit which was just merged:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/7f0051d4736ae1b464efb6c1edcadbab688bb496

Failing tests:
